title: Easy, User friendly & Beautiful Event Management System
name: Caitlin K.
pros: Pros: I love the easy, visual, drag and drop event page editor. It has simple yet elegant design features (choose your event page color of choice, upload an image, draft your event description and tagline, input your event hashtag to pull in your instagram & twitter feed, etc.). I also love that it is super easy to create coupon codes for specific events, export spreadsheets of attendees, and include customized event questions (anything you want with multiple question field options). I've also experienced great customer service- very relational and helpful phone calls with little to no wait time.
cons: Cons: Ticketleap is made for events that are on one date (not a span of multiple dates) so you have to get a little creative when it comes to dates for longer events (like conferences, etc).

title: I like it a lot.
name: Glen J.
pros: Pros: TicketLeap has a shopping cart *and* recurring event support. If a patron wants to buy tickets for multiple performances of the same show, across multiple dates or times, TicketLeap lets you select everything you want and enter your payment information just once. It's not the cheapest, but it does what I need. Every year I take another look around at what's available, in case I've missed something prettier or cooler or cheaper, but I end up staying with TicketLeap. It's also easy to refund tickets for people that made mistakes. I think I've swapped performances for people too. And -- I've done discounted advance cash sales and sent the buyers tickets via the management back end, and was not charged a fee.
cons: Cons: I don't recall having any particular complaints.

title: Good Ticketing Platform
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: The fees are lower than other platforms. The ability to customize page.
cons: Cons: The reports are not easy to navigate and set up could be simplified.

title: Essential for Event Organizers
name: Christie C.
pros: Pros: TicketLeap will make your life infinitely easier. Event setup is easy. Payments are quick. The social media integration makes marketing easier. The sale statistics make tracking marketing and engagement a breeze. Easy to check in guests.
cons: Cons: The app could be a little more robust but overall it's a great service/application.

title: Very solid solution for ticketing for a non-profit community theater
name: Chad M.
usage: Used the software for: Less than 6 months
pros: Pros: The ability to have multiple users with box office access, the quick check-in system, and the overall quality of the experience are excellent. Inventory management is a plus. Pricing is very reasonable and competitive. Presentation of events is well done.
cons: Cons: Difficult to do reservations that are paid at the door. URLs are by nature a little clunky but not hard to link to.
overall: Overall: Very effective solution for us. The support is quick and helpful. There are some minor issues that do not fit with our business model but they can be fairly painless overcome with work arounds.

title: Ticketleap was by far our favorite ticketing company!
name: Verified Reviewer
pros: Pros: We loved the interface and ease of setting up and managing tickets from one dashboard especially considering we had tried the other platforms and we didnt like them as much and the fees were higher.
cons: Cons: The only thing we didn't like I would have to say is the customer support. Sometimes it took a little bit longer to get a response and when youre running a high end show sometimes you need instant support.
overall: Overall: Very effective solution for us. The support is quick and helpful. There are some minor issues that do not fit with our business model but they can be fairly painless overcome with work arounds.

title: It's been great
name: Jami C.
pros: Pros: We have used this for several clients and really love it as we do annual events and it easy to duplicate an event when you do it year after year.
cons: Cons: We had a few payment issues but customer service was always quick to fix. Customization was also harder when we started but has improved over the years.
overall: Overall: Very effective solution for us. The support is quick and helpful. There are some minor issues that do not fit with our business model but they can be fairly painless overcome with work arounds.

title: Ticket Leap Makes Selling Tickets A Breeze
name: Molly T.
comments: Comments: I have used several different online ticketing platforms for my artists, but keep coming back to Ticket Leap. They are easy to use and offer a wide variety of features. My favorite features are being able to customize the ticket page, offer multiple ticket types, and ease of setting a seating chart. Their customer service is top-notch and always quick to respond. We have never had any issues when running an event through them. Easy for use and the customer. Low ticketing fees are also a plus.
pros: Pros: We have used this for several clients and really love it as we do annual events and it easy to duplicate an event when you do it year after year.
cons: Cons: We had a few payment issues but customer service was always quick to fix. Customization was also harder when we started but has improved over the years.
overall: Overall: Very effective solution for us. The support is quick and helpful. There are some minor issues that do not fit with our business model but they can be fairly painless overcome with work arounds.
